storyInfo: Whether for her hometown or for Rhodes Island, Purestream is always handling the 'trivial' matters that seem unremarkable to her, without anyone knowing.

attributes.content: 7:00 PM \ Cloudy
Mid-Level Deck Hallway, Rhodes Island
...Weird.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Where did Purestream go?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: She's not in the wastewater processing area, the pipe system monitoring room, or the bioengineering lab—
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I don't even see her in the communal bath...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Phew—This is awesome. A brand spanking new communal bath! What do they usually say about this stuff again? Technology really improves our lives.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Landship Operator A

attributes.content: Automatic showers, always heated pools, steam saunas...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Landship Operator A

attributes.content: That water massage bed is especially amazing. It changes its pressure and direction so finely it's like you're getting an actual massage!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Landship Operator A

attributes.content: Should've expected nothing less from a new facility born from Weedy's bioengineering research... Feels like all the stress I've accumulated since I was born has disappeared!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Landship Operator A

attributes.content: Hey, what stress do you even have? Actually, how long has it been since the last time you and I were on a field mission? All we've been doing is hanging around on the ship. I'm almost ashamed to enjoy this.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Landship Operator B

attributes.content: A good number of field operators are coming back to the ship the next few days. That's the only reason Engineering has been rushing to finish renovating the bath.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Landship Operator B

attributes.content: You and I, we're just riding on their coattails.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Landship Operator B

attributes.content: It's just as I thought. The newly renovated bath's packed.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: And here I thought Purestream would be one of the first to hop in once it was open—
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I mean, she and the others at Engineering spent months of hard work on it.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Wh-What?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: You're heading home? And you asked Closure for a long vacation?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Yeah... Actually, I've been on vacation since the day before yesterday. It's just that I've been spending my time in the records room...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Sorry, Mul. Even though I promised we'd soak together in the bath for days after the renovation was over.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Oh... I-It's not a problem. I just thought it was a little sudden...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I mean, you were so busy not too long ago. You were cooped up inside the pipelines almost every day, inspecting the existing pipes and preparing the new drainage system for the renovation.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: You even said we should all take a bath together once you were done...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Did something happen between you and the other engineers? Did you have a fight?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Did you forget to go through the disinfection procedures after coming back from the wastewater tanks, and Weedy—
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: No, that's not it. Everyone at Engineering has been nothing but kind, and Weedy in particular has been taking good care of me. She even asked me what kind of facilities I wanted to see in the communal bath!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I-Is it me, then? Did I do something to upset you so much that you're going home?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: O-Of course not! Actually, I should really thank you! There were a few times I was so busy I forgot to eat, and you brought me some Yanese wraps from the cafeteria!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Mm, actually I just wanted some extras for mys— Uh, no, I mean... you seemed so busy, and I thought you should at least eat something.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I know, I know~ The wraps you brought back were so tasty!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Then why are you suddenly—
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hm, it's here. So fast~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Let me get the door.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Huh? What's here?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Purestream, I have brought the requested data regarding Dusk City meteorological and hydrological observations and the rafting team.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: This data transfer has been authorized by the 'lovely Ms. Closure.' Please connect your terminal to me, and I will begin the transfer.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Alright! Let's see... I just need to set it down here, right?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Correct. Please set it down as stably as you can—Please confirm.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Okay, I got it... These pictures are so clear! The river water seems to have a little too much silt. Looks like we'll need to keep an eye on the runoff volume and change in sediment discharge rates.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: But overall, based solely on the data we have on hand, this doesn't look so bad!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: The weather forecast looks good, too. It's practically sunny days all the way through~ Looks like this river rafting trip will go really well!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Thank you, Lancet-2! You've been a great help!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: No need to thank me, but I must note that such requests are outside the scope of my ordinary medical duties.
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: If you require any additional data, please file your request with the 'lovely Ms. Closure.'
attributes.name: Lancet-2

attributes.content: Rafting? Do you mean that famous Dusk River Rafting Team?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I saw in the newspaper a few days ago that they're going to take on a feeder river somewhere downstream... I think it was called Wuwu River?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Supposedly nobody has 'conquered' it yet?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Right! Wuwu is the river that passes through my hometown. The name makes it sound murky, but the waters are actually very clear!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: The old men in the village said it's called the Wuwu because it's full of black pebbles on the bottom, making the whole river look black.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: So... Did you apply for your vacation to join the Dusk River Rafting Team at the Wuwu? You even looked up the meteorological and hydrological data...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: N-No, that's not why! I don't know the first thing about rafting. It's not as simple as swimming, where you just have to keep paddling forward...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Uh... Swimming is pretty difficult too, isn't it?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Swimming is just the basics! The people on the rafting team are much more amazing! They're all athletes who have rafted hundreds of times.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: As for the meteorological and hydrological data... I'm just a little worried about the river back home. It's been so long since I last went back. I don't know if the villagers and the people upstream have been taking good care of it...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I just hope that when the Wuwu shows up in the newspapers, it'll be in its purest form~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Huh? Newspapers?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Oh, right! Take a look at these!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Are these... pictures of the rafting team?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: That's right. This is the Guantou River, this is the Tufang River, and this is Shanyu River... All of them have graced the front page of the papers before!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: And now my hometown's Wuwu River is going to make it too! Of course I have to go back to witness this historic moment!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Is... having your hometown's river show up in the papers really something to be so happy about? You must really love it there.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Of course! Don't you always pick your hometown's dishes in the cafeteria too?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Th-That's just because I think other cuisines don't add enough seasoning...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hm? They're not so bad... Back home, the villagers love making their food bland. It tastes just like the Wuwu River~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Maybe that's why I think it's okay for food to be bland. It's good for your health~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Tastes like the Wuwu River?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Yep! Back home, everyone cooked with the river water~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Must be a really clean river...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hehe~ That's thanks to everyone working together to keep it that way. Once, we had some really dirty stuff floating down from upstream. It made everyone so mad!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Huh? Was it caused by a Catastrophe?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (Shakes head) Nope.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Then... industrial wastewater?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: No way... Even a village's river...?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: We put in so much effort to make sure our natural lakes and rivers aren't irreversibly damaged by Catastrophes, but we still can't escape industrial pollution.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I get it. Industries need to expand too. It's not really something that we can do anything about... And if only a few contaminants make it into the rivers, then maybe nature itself can still purify them...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: But if we don't bring the pollution under control, they're only going to accumulate, and then—
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: When you put at it like that, the rivers in these pictures are all maintained pretty well. Although you can still see the mark of Catastrophes...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I suppose our waterway management work has really made a difference.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Yep, yep! But my hometown's management of the Wuwu is even better!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: If the Wuwu River makes it into the newspapers with the rafting team, even more people will know that there are still such pure streams out there~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: That way, maybe people will stop dumping all that dirty stuff into their rivers!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Wh-What's the matter? Did I say something funny?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: No... It just occurred to me all of a sudden that you have a really ambitious dream!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: It's extraordinary.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I-I'm not really doing anything! The rafting team chose to challenge the Wuwu River because they want to let more people know about the importance of protecting the rivers' ecosystems.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: And rafting's so dangerous and cool! Everyone's gonna be cheering them on—They're the ones making a difference.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: (This makes me wonder... What would the river bordering Jiangqi look like clean?)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: (Was it once just as pure as these, years ago?)
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Mul. Mul? Something on your mind?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Ah! Sorry, I spaced out a bit...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Oh, I almost forgot... I'm here to give you this—it's a ginger pear my parents sent me. They're a specialty from my hometown! I've been looking for you everywhere because I wanted you to have a taste.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hmmhmmhmm~♪
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Soon, I'll be home to see the rafting team~ Yay!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Mul gave me a huge pear, too~ Yay!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: What kind of local specialty should I bring back for her as a souvenir?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: This...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: The water that came out of that pipe seemed... just a little dirty, I think?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Looks like it's back to normal... Yeah, it tastes...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: The next day...
9:30 A.M. \ Overcast
Rhodes Island Boarding Ramp
Look what time it is... How come Purestream isn't here yet?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: *sigh* She seemed to really like that pear, so I thought I'd bring her a few more to bring home for her friends and family.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: But where did she go?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Weird, I don't see her anywhere... Did she leave already?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Man, I'm beat... From here on out, I'm turning down all field missions in Sargon! It's hot as hell there, and the local clients look down on me because of my tail. Sheesh...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator A

attributes.content: Say, why don't we ever get missions in Siesta or Dossoles? If only we had some kind of observation mission that needed us diving in the waters there. You know I'd finish all my duties without issue.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator A

attributes.content: You might as well just say you want to go swimming in the sea. But it's already fall. You'll get joint pain if you soak too long.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator B

attributes.content: Little illnesses ain't nothing to be worried about. Big illnesses, well, there's no way to avoid them, so why worry either? Right... didn't the captain say the landship's bath house got renovated? I think I'll head there right now.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator A

attributes.content: Forget it. I just saw the announcements on my terminal. They stopped the water.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator B

attributes.content: Huh? No way—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator A

attributes.content: Did they say... they stopped the water?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Does that mean...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Meanwhile, in a dark corner of Rhodes Island—
Okay, I finished checking all the pipes in this area. None of them show any major issues. Next up...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Hm, if I remember correctly, there's still the area around the bath—
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Do you need to check the communal bath's piping, too? It's just reopened.
Hmm...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Let's take a look there, just to be safe.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: This will do. All done!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I'm not too familiar with the new pipe system's routing yet. There are so many twists and turns here. If I had to work on this by myself, who knows how long it would have taken me? Thanks for helping me with the directions, Weedy—
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: It's okay. I didn't do much...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Really, though, the waterway system under the communal bath is so amazing~ It hasn't been that long, but there's already such a thick layer of dirt here, just like—
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Stop, stop, stop! No need to go into detail.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Looking at it now, the water usage lately has been quite high. Looks like the new bath's really popular~ There's even a natural water circulation system. I guess wishes really do come true!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Huh? Wish? Did you toss a coin into the pool, too?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: O-Of course not! You can't throw coins into pools! No, you can't throw anything into pools!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: By 'wish,' I mean... Do you remember when you asked me what new facilities I wanted to see?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Actually, I'm not too familiar with bathing facilities... So I just thought it'd be nice if, just like the river back home, I could swim around freely. Flip and turn in the water as I want.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: It was just a whim since I knew there's limited space in the bath, but I didn't expect it to actually come true! Not to mention the circulation system is also helping keep it clean...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: This is all thanks to you and everyone at the Engineering Department... Hehe, I'm so fortunate I get to live aboard Rhodes Island~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: We can't take all the credit.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: If it weren't for you, we wouldn't have found all of the problems with the old piping system. Besides, haven't you been taking care of the cleaning during the construction?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Mhm~ It's what I'm good at, after all! It's nothing, really! N-Nothing at all!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: What's that noise...? Why is the transmission coming in so broken...?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: W-Weedy... What's my position right now?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: That's... the passage from the bath to the dorms.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: What's wrong? What happened?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: It looks like something's stuck here... It could get flushed out if there's a sudden surge of water.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Hm... It's kinda hard to get out...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: It's fine. Don't worry about it and come back. I noted the position, and I'll let the Engineering operators in charge of maintenance know to check on it later.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: It's okay. Let me take it out first, then we'll—
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Hm... That's a loud surge of water...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Did you get it out?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Purestream?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Purestream? Purestream! Hello? Can you hear me?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Oh no... She's not responding at all... Is it because of that sudden surge of water...?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: If the water pressure's too high, a sudden impact could...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Leaf, hurry! Head to the waterways and take a look—
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Phew—Wow, that hurts my mouth so much...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I didn't expect this to be so heavy...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Hey, Weedy! Don't worry. I've got it all taken care of. I brought the thing back with me!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: At the entrance to the waterway, Purestream pokes her head out and waves what she removed from the pipes at the anxious Weedy.
So... You weren't talking because you were holding it in your mouth?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Yep, the water was really strong, and I still had my staff and my cleaning tools, so I had to hold it with my mouth—It wasn't until I heard your voice through my terminal that I realized I couldn't talk.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Sheesh, you could've told me! I was so scared—
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Oh, it's okay. Don't worry! Thanks to my Arts, I can breathe normally underwater, and it keeps me from being affected by any impurities too. Though the taste of the wastewater is a little...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: That's not the problem!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Hehe... Sorry. I forgot.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Alright, as long as you're okay.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Now hurry up.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Mmhmm!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Purestream climbs up from the waterway, flicks off all the water on her, and steps onto the ladder.
Just as she is climbing onto the deck, she seems to suddenly slip and starts to fall backwards.
Whoa—
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: W-Watch out!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Before Purestream completely loses her balance, Leaf props her up from behind.
In the spur of the moment, Weedy reaches out and grabs Purestream's hand, helping her climb onto the deck.
Phew... That was close! I almost slipped...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Thanks, Weedy... and Leaf!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Purestream notices that Weedy is holding her wrist tightly.
Right before their eyes, a drop of grayish water flows down Purestream's arm and onto Weedy's finger.
Um... Weedy, I'm a little dirty right now. I thought you didn't like...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Ah, it's fine.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'm not going to the lab today. This doesn't violate its sterile—
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Weedy... You're getting bumps on your skin. Maybe we should take you to Medical to get them checked out?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Oh... It's fine. Maybe it's just because it's a little cold here in the lower decks. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I found them! They're here!
attributes.name: Engineering Department Intern Operator

attributes.content: Purestream! And... Weedy and Leaf?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hm? Mul? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: You're asking me...? Isn't today the day you're going home? Why are you still here—
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Didn't you say you were leaving at noon?
attributes.name: Mulberry
Purestream
attributes.content: Yeah, but there's still a long time until...

attributes.name: Purestream
attributes.content: Huh?! It's almost ten?
I didn't notice at all... Time goes by so fast~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Hm? Purestream... You were leaving for home today?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You could've told me sooner. I would've had the maintenance operators come fix this... Although they probably wouldn't have cleaned it as quickly and thoroughly as you.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: What... No way. You two worked all night?! Right up till now?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Ahaha...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I didn't expect time to go by so fast, either...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Last night, I noticed there was a bit of wastewater flowing backwards through the pipes, so I thought I'd inspect it again before I left.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Good thing there weren't any major issues with the sewage system~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: But if it's just a little bit of wastewater flowing in reverse... That's not really urgent, is it? If we followed the regular maintenance schedule—
attributes.name: Engineering Department Intern Operator

attributes.content: No, that won't do. We should trust our water treatment specialist.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: A-Actually... under normal circumstances, we really wouldn't have to take care of it so quickly.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: It's just... I heard we'll have more and more operators coming back from their field missions over the next few days. I'm sure everyone wants to try out the new bath, so I figured the water usage would shoot up in the short term.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: That's why I...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: It's not a problem, Purestream. The thing you found jamming the waterway proves you made the right call.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: If there were a surge of water volume, the high water pressure could also flush any loose parts. If any were to get caught in the narrower pipes and cause grime to accumulate, it could lead to serious issues down the line.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Right, right! Back when I cleaned the river back home, we had situations like this plenty of times!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: You can't ignore even the slightest abnormality in the river. If you get a multi-day rain—
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Even the tiniest thing could unleash its mighty powers~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Phew—The bath's so great! Now both the waterways and my body are sparkling clean~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Taking a bath after work is the best!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Purestream... I'm a little curious.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: How exactly did you fall asleep in that pool with the water currents?
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: It gets pretty rocky in there, doesn't it? I tried it out for a little bit, but felt so dizzy—
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Huh? No way... It felt so good in there! Weedy spent a lot of time experimenting in order to recreate how an actual river moves!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Just soaking in it reminds me of the Wuwu back home.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: It's a good thing we still have time. Not only did I finish my work, I got to clean myself up in the new bath, too!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: But if you're looking forward to going home so much, didn't it cross your mind that you could miss your ride? You might not have made it home before the rafting team takes on the Wuwu River!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Hmm... it did cross my mind, actually.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: It'd be a shame if I missed the rafting team, but the villagers are bound to have lots of pictures to show me!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: But I also wouldn't be able to go home with a carefree heart if I didn't check the landship's waterways before I left.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Each waterway is like a natural river to me. Even though it's in the ship right now, the water will return to nature at some point, no?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Even though Rhodes Island's water quality and wastewater disposal both exceed standards because of how strict Weedy is, it's always best to investigate as soon as you find something.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I mean, 'dirty stuff' tends to accumulate~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Besides...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: When everyone's back from their field missions, they won't have to worry about having no water or dirty water. They'll get to soak in a hot bath without a thing on their minds. That's what my work means to me~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Purestream...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I think...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Oh... Looks like the car is here. Off I go now!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Thanks, Mul, for all the huge pears~! The villagers will love them!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Yep! Have a nice trip! I look forward to seeing you and the rafting team in the same picture in the newspaper!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Huh? Th-That's not going to happen! You'll probably only see the Wuwu River...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: But if I make it home before the rafting challenge begins, maybe I can still help everyone clean up the river first!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Hehe, I sure hope I'll be able to help the rafting team!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: You're on vacation; get some rest!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: Got it, Mul~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I'll bring you some of my hometown specialties, too!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: See you later~
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: There she goes...
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I don't think she realizes just how extraordinary what she's doing is.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: It's no less noble than the rafting team, or the researchers.
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: I'll tell her that directly when she gets back!
attributes.name: Mulberry

attributes.content: But... when is she coming back again?
attributes.name: Mulberry
